basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=250 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=16 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=31 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=8 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=32 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=63 µg/ml).
